attributes.action: Sack the Childrens Commissioner Dr Maggie Atkinson
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dr Maggie Atkinson stated that the killing of Jamie Bulger was 'exceptionally unpleasant' and that children commiting such crimes should 'make reparation'. I dont see how his killers can make reparation for such a crime and to call such a brutal murder exceptionally unpleasant, is an insult. I find this view totally abhorrent and an insult to the memory of James Bulger and his family. Her actions must only add to that family’s grief. I believe the only reason for her making these ridiculous statements is self promotion, and her position as Children’s Commissioner is untenable.

rejection.details: The Children's Commissioner is independent of Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
